resources.string: Scan here for information about your PC.

Our team is passionate about leveraging blockchain technology to create secure and transparent solutions for the future.Together, we shared commitment to excellence and a passion for delivering good-quality results.
We are a group of three enthusiastic students dedicated to providing comprehensive information about the various computers from labs in our college campus.

The name of our app is InfoGate.This app has been created for computer labs using blockchain. Through this app, the user can scan the QR code installed on the computer and access all its information, such as which department it belongs to and the date of its installation.

In this app, there are options for both user login and admin login. A user can log in and scan, and then obtain the complete information. An admin can retrieve all the records stored in the database using blockchain and can also add records. After adding records, a QR code will be generated, which can then be printed as well.

Our mission is to create a user-friendly app that serves as a one-stop destination for college faculty to access comprehensive information about our college's computer lab.

Thank you for using our InfoGate App. We hope you find it informative and valuable for student's academic journey\!
DSR Page No. and SR NO.
